TASK: Craft an item of type: quartz_block
inventory=[{"type": "nether_brick_wall", "quantity": 48, "index": 10}, {"type": "purple_dye", "quantity": 60, "index": 14}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 53, "index": 18}, {"type": "nether_quartz_ore", "quantity": 4, "index": 24}, {"type": "purple_concrete_powder", "quantity": 29, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft a quartz_block, I first need to smelt 4 nether_quartz_ore into quartz. I will smelt the first nether_quartz_ore from slot 24 into the empty slot 11.
Ok
act: smelt from slot 24 to slot 11 with quantity 1
